sentences.en: A farmer produced a bale of hay. One horse or another can eat it, but not both.
sentences.cn: 一位农民产出了一捆干草。一匹马或另一匹马可以把它吃掉，但不可以两匹都吃。

sentences.en: The country has pretty much defeated the boll weevil, and the Department of Agriculture individually tests every bale on obscure measures.
sentences.cn: 这个国家几乎已经打败了棉铃象鼻虫，农业部对每包棉铃都用复杂难懂的方法进行了单独的测试。

sentences.en: Have you heard of a "pee bale"?
